news.title: Egyptian President Sisi to visit Russia 1
news.content: Egyptian President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi will visit Russia on August 26, 2015 to discuss the situation in the Middle East and North Africa, the Kremlin said on Tuesday.

charities.name: Egyptian Food Bank
charities.description: The Egyptian Food Bank is a non-profit organization that aims to alleviate hunger in Egypt. It was founded in 2006 by Moez Masoud and is based in Cairo.

charities.name: Misr El Kheir
charities.description: Misr El Kheir is an Egyptian non-profit organization that was established in 2007. It aims to develop the Egyptian society and to alleviate poverty.

charities.name: Resala
charities.description: Resala is an Egyptian non-profit organization that was established in 1999. It aims to develop the Egyptian society and to alleviate poverty.
